trans-unit.source: Provides change monitoring for SQL Server databases.
trans-unit.target: 提供对 SQL Server 数据库的更改监视。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor> class wraps the ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> class and adds change monitoring for SQL Server-based dependencies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor>类将包装 ADO.NET<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>类并添加更改监视的基于 SQL Server 的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor> class serves as a bridge between the ADO.NET <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object and the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor>类用作 ADO.NET 之间的桥梁<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>对象和<xref:System.Runtime.Caching>命名空间。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents an ADO.NET <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 ADO.NET <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency" /> 对象的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor.%23ctor%2A> method binds the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange> event of the object in `dependency` to the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor.OnChanged%2A> method handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor.%23ctor%2A>方法绑定<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency.OnChange>中对象的事件`dependency`到<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor.OnChanged%2A>方法处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This enables the change monitor to receive notification of changes in SQL Server databases.
trans-unit.target: 这使更改监视器以在 SQL Server 数据库接收的更改通知。

trans-unit.source: When you invoke the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor.%23ctor%2A> constructor, you must pass a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，则必须传递<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>对象作为参数。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> object, you must pass a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> parameter to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>对象，则必须传递<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>的构造函数参数。

trans-unit.source: The constructor for <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> class lets you specify optional information for configuring the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency> instance.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>类允许您指定用于配置的可选信息<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDependency>实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets an identifier for a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor" /> 实例的标识符。

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the change monitor.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.SqlChangeMonitor> class generates a GUID for this property.
